title: gemstateio-groups
description: Schema for Idaho tech creative group list

fields.name: TLD
fields.description: Acronym used by the group to self-identify, e.g. Boise Software Developers Group members call it 'BSDG'

fields.name: Locality
fields.description: Locality (incorporated city or town) of the group's in-person meetings, or 'Online' if there is no in-person meeting

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A brief text description of the group. No HTML/links please (we'll provide for linking later, although see 'Next Meeting URL')

fields.name: Recurrence
fields.description: Recurrence of meetings, if known, in RFC 2445 notation.

fields.name: Next Meeting URL
fields.description: A URL for more information about the next upcoming meeting (required), and general group info (not required)
